ComicInfo.Summary: Showgirls Are Forever: The year is 1941. France has succeeded in setting the world record for the quickest surrender to Nazi Germany without putting up a fight. Cheng Bo Sen is a Hong Kong cop and British Secret Agent. He also speaks hip-hop which no one seems to notice. Bo Sen is sent by the Queen of England to break up a gang of Showgirls to foil a plot by Vichy France to use a Nazi bomber to destroy a target in America.
ComicInfo.Writer: Dave Sim,Howard Shum,Howard M. Shum,Dave Sim,Howard M. Shum
ComicInfo.Inker: Howard Shum,Howard M. Shum,Howard M. Shum
ComicInfo.Title: Showgirls Are Forever
